Albert is a molecular biologist turned mathematician turned
software engineer. He is a passionate open source contributor with
a special interest in open science and publishing workflows. He
serves as a core developer for the universal document converter
“pandoc”. After spending time in Lübeck, Hamburg, and Menlo Park,
Albert now lives in Berlin with his wife and kids.
